title: Embracing the Leopard
description: Born of leopard shifter parents, Erik had always known his feelings for other men werenâ€™t natural for his kind. Caught between two worlds, his desires for another man and his animal within, he has chosen to be alone rather than surround himself with what he cannot have.Then Brandon comes into his life, and he discovers a whole new way of looking at things, and of embracing both halves of his nature.
author: Michelle Houston
